original_text:
he builds his lofty palace in the heavens
    and sets its foundation on the earth;
he calls for the waters of the sea
    and pours them out over the face of the land—
    the Lord is his name.
korean_text: 그의 궁전을 하늘에 세우시며 그 궁창의 기초를 땅에 두시며 바닷물을 불러 지면에 쏟으시는 이니 그 이름은 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: he builds his lofty palace in the heavens
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하늘에 그의 높은 궁전을 건설하며

sentences.original_text: and sets its foundation on the earth
he calls for the waters of the sea
and pours them out over the face of the land
